pullRequest.title: Add bitamp_to_string function
pullRequest.bodyText:
This CL changes:

add function bitmap_to_string, which will convert a bitmap to string
which contains all bit in bitmap
add function murmur_hash3_32, which will compute murmur hash for
input strings
make the function cast float to string the same with user result
logic

#2706

commit.message:
Add bitamp_to_string function

This CL changes:

1. add function bitmap_to_string, which will convert a bitmap to string
which contains all bit in bitmap
2. add function murmur_hash3_32, which will compute murmur hash for
input strings
3. make the function cast float to string the same with user result
logic

nodes.bodyText: Would better give a valid string format description.
Would better add a invalid string format test case
Would better describe what's is valid or invalid string input.

+# bitmap_from_string
+
+## description
+### Syntax
+
+`BITMAP BITMAP_FROM_STRING(VARCHAR input)`
+
+将一个字符串转化为一个BITAMP，如果输入的字符串不合法，返回NULL.

commit.message: Add some more comments and UT for new functions
